description: MODPKG files are designed to allows users to share modifications to Minecraft gameplay and are similar to .JS scripts. Since you cannot load the MODPKG file directly into Minecraft: Pocket Edition you need to use the BlockLauncher app, which wraps around the Minecraft: Pocket Edition game to enable users to load mods, patches, and texture packs into the game.
